title: Add company logo and contact details

requirements.text: Display the Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo prominently in the website header and app navigation

quotes: I need add my logo in the website and app

acceptanceCriteria: Logo is visible in the header/navigation area
Logo maintains its aspect ratio and quality
Logo is clickable and navigates to home page

requirements.text: Display contact phone number 6382281842 in the website footer and app contact section
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is displayed with appropriate formatting
Phone number is clickable and initiates a call on mobile devices

requirements.text: Display contact email shasvanthtoursandtravels@gmail.com in the website footer and app contact section
acceptanceCriteria: Email address is clickable and opens default email client

requirements.text: Render the generated logo image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is stored in the correct directory
Logo is properly imported and displayed in components

nonGoals: Implementing booking functionality in this request
Backend changes for contact information storage

required: Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo with colorful peacock design on left, temple icon above 'h', golden-yellow text for 'Shasvanth', red text for 'Tours & Travels', and red paper plane icon on right, transparent background (shasvanth-logo.dim_800x300.png)
